database.name: VIEW ESCM_BANKGUARANTEEDET_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS escm_bankguaranteedet_v_id, det.ad_client_id, det.ad_org_id, det.isactive, det.created, det.createdby, det.updated, det.updatedby, det.line, bg.internalno, bg.bankguaranteetype, det.bankbgno, det.bankname, det.bgstartdateh, det.bgstartdategre, det.expirydategre, det.expirydateh, det.bgstatus, det.bgamount, bg.document_amount, bg.initialbg, bg.escm_proposalmgmt_id, bg.escm_proposal_attr_id, bg.c_order_id, bg.escm_bgworkbench_id FROM escm_bankguarantee_detail det JOIN escm_bgworkbench bg ON bg.escm_bgworkbench_id = det.escm_bgworkbench_id UNION SELECT get_uuid() AS escm_bankguaranteedet_v_id, det.ad_client_id, det.ad_org_id, det.isactive, det.created, det.createdby, det.updated, det.updatedby, det.line, bg.internalno, bg.bankguaranteetype, det.bankbgno, det.bankname, det.bgstartdateh, det.bgstartdategre, det.expirydategre, det.expirydateh, det.bgstatus, det.bgamount, bg.document_amount, bg.initialbg, bg.escm_proposalmgmt_id, bg.escm_proposal_attr_id, ord.c_order_id, bg.escm_bgworkbench_id FROM escm_bankguarantee_detail det JOIN escm_bgworkbench bg ON bg.escm_bgworkbench_id = det.escm_bgworkbench_id JOIN c_order ord ON ord.em_escm_base_order = bg.c_order_id UNION SELECT get_uuid() AS escm_bankguaranteedet_v_id, det.ad_client_id, det.ad_org_id, det.isactive, det.created, det.createdby, det.updated, det.updatedby, det.line, bg.internalno, bg.bankguaranteetype, det.bankbgno, det.bankname, det.bgstartdateh, det.bgstartdategre, det.expirydategre, det.expirydateh, det.bgstatus, det.bgamount, bg.document_amount, bg.initialbg, prop.escm_proposalmgmt_id, bg.escm_proposal_attr_id, bg.c_order_id, bg.escm_bgworkbench_id FROM escm_bankguarantee_detail det JOIN escm_bgworkbench bg ON bg.escm_bgworkbench_id = det.escm_bgworkbench_id JOIN escm_proposalmgmt prop ON prop.escm_baseproposal_id = bg.escm_proposalmgmt_id
